//     id	name			type	currency	[item id	amount]*
// type can be SPECIALIST or GENERAL
// GENERAL will use low alch prices, SPECIALIST will use high alch prices
// GENERAL allows (nearly) any item, SPECIALIST allows only ones that you specify
// 995 - coins - default currency - others aren't implemented well yet
//	7929	1	7930	1	7931	1	7932	1	7933	1	7934	1	7970	1
// here are the actual shops
